text: @kenolin1 Rand wants us to believe 1 person,a game show personality as being th source of info on the coronavirus & COVID-19 pandemic. If my parents were alive,they'd believe Trump 100% & I'd never be able to visit them-- no masks, no social distancing,& on top of the repeating DJT 100%.
